highlights.title: Providers
highlights.description: We export a SandpackProvider that manages the state and actions for sandpack and a ThemeProvider that handles the theme and style.

highlights.title: Custom Hooks
highlights.description: A set of hooks gives you access to the state and offer an API for integrating custom components into sandpack.

highlights.title: Sandpack Components
highlights.description: We also export the smaller parts that make up the <Sandpack /> component, so you can combine them with your custom components.

highlights.title: Sandpack Client
highlights.description: The bundler is wrapped by a small package called sandpack-client, which is framework agnostic and allows you to tap into the bundler protocol.

highlights.title: Full editor experience
highlights.description: Sandpack is using CodeMirror under the hood, giving you all the basic capabilities of a code editor and syntax highlight.

highlights.title: Advanced preview
highlights.description: Sandpack embeds the browser bundler that powers codesandbox.io and takes advantage of the following features: hot module reloading API, friendly error overlay, powerful transpilation result caching, dependency resolver.

highlights.title: Export to CodeSandbox
highlights.description: With Sandpack, you're always one click away from opening your code snippet in codesandbox

highlights.title: Start with preset templates
highlights.description: Use the template prop to choose an option made by CodeSandbox: react, angular, vanilla.

highlights.title: Customize your setup
highlights.description: If you want to add dependencies or you need a different file structure, you can use the customSetup prop.

highlights.title: Configure your editor
highlights.description: The options prop allows you to toggle on/off different features of the code editor.

highlights.title: Customize your setup
highlights.description: Use the theme prop to set a predefined option made by CodeSandbox. Try below, just click to change code and see all the predefined options. (mention the user can create its own theme).

highlights.title: Build your own Sandpack
highlights.description: The library exports a set of composable components and hooks that allow you to tailor the editing experience to your own needs.
